Body:
import numpy as np
import theano
from lasagne.updates import norm_constraint
from lasagne.utils import compute_norms
max_norm = 0.01
param = theano.shared(np.random.randn(*((25,) * ndim)).astype(theano.config
    .floatX))
update = norm_constraint(param, max_norm)
apply_update = theano.function([], [], updates=[(param, update)])
apply_update()
assert param.dtype == update.dtype
assert np.max(compute_norms(param.get_value())) <= max_norm * (1 +
    PCT_TOLERANCE)
pytest.mark.parametrize('ndim', [2, 3])
